title: DeHashed

description: U.S. government repository of vulnerability management data.

title: SecurityTrails
description: DNS and domain intelligence platform with historical data.

title: GreyNoise
description: Analyzes internet scanning traffic to identify threats.

description: Search engine for vulnerabilities in software and hardware.

title: LeakIX

description: Bug bounty program publishing disclosed vulnerabilities.

title: VirusTotal
description: Analyzes suspicious files and URLs for malware.

title: ThreatMiner
description: Data portal for threat intelligence and indicators.

title: Censys
description: Platform for discovering internet devices and certificates.

title: BleepingComputer
description: News and tutorials on malware, security updates, and breaches.

title: The Hacker News
description: Leading cybersecurity news source covering latest threats.

title: KrebsOnSecurity
description: Investigative cybersecurity journalism by Brian Krebs.

title: Dark Reading
description: Security news and threat research for professionals.

title: SecurityWeek
description: Cybersecurity news and analysis.

title: CyberNews
description: Security news and data breach investigations.

title: ThreatPost
description: Independent news covering vulnerabilities and cyber threats.

title: Malwarebytes Labs
description: Research and analysis on malware and cyber threats.

title: Talos Intelligence

title: FireEye Threat Research
description: Reports on advanced threats and attack campaigns.

title: MITRE ATT&CK
description: Knowledge base of adversary tactics and techniques.

description: Open source threat intelligence platform.

title: Pulsedive
